verses.roman:
bhakta-gaṇe rākhiyā āinu nija nija sthāne
āmā-saṅge āilā sabe pāṅca-chaya jane

synonyms: bhakta-gaṇe—the devotees; rākhiyā—keeping; āinu—I came; nija nija sthāne—in their respective places; āmā-saṅge—with Me; āilā—came; sabe—only; pāṅca-chaya jane—five or six men.
translation: "I then left all the devotees there and brought only five or six persons with Me.
